full_text: I will miss Kmart.  Worked at the local one as a teen, hired me as a "stock-boy" with no experience, after awhile I threatened to quit unless I was promoted to the electronics department, they caved and then every evening was spent talking video games and watching TV, good times. https://t.co/RMa24G1Bgq
